channel.title: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the National Assembly

item.title: Opinion Poll by Mediana for POP TV, 26 August 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Slovenska demokratska stranka: 27.0–35.1%
  • Lista Marjana Šarca: 10.6–16.6%
  • Socialni demokrati: 7.7–13.1%
  • Stranka modernega centra: 4.5–8.8%
  • Levica: 7.2–12.4%
  • Nova Slovenija–Krščanski demokrati: 4.6–9.0%
  • Stranka Alenke Bratušek: 3.1–6.9%
  • Demokratična stranka upokojencev Slovenije: 1.7–4.7%
  • Slovenska nacionalna stranka: 3.1–6.9%

  • Slovenska ljudska stranka: 0 seats
